trans-unit.source: Represents creating a new array and possibly initializing the elements of the new array.
trans-unit.target: 代表建立新陣列，並可能初始化新陣列的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different factory methods that you can use to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression> depending on the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> you require.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示不同的 factory 方法，可讓您建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression>取決於<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A>您要求。

trans-unit.source: Factory Methods
trans-unit.target: Factory 方法

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression> object that represents creating and initializing a one-dimensional array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression>物件，表示建立和初始化字串的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The next example creates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression> object that represents creating a two-dimensional array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 下一個範例會建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression>物件，表示建立字串的二維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The visitor to visit this node with.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽這個節點的造訪者。

trans-unit.source: Dispatches to the specific visit method for this node type.
trans-unit.target: 分派給這個節點類型的特定造訪方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> calls the <see cref="M:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall(System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression)" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression" /> 會呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall(System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression)" />。

trans-unit.source: The result of visiting this node.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽這個節點的結果。

trans-unit.source: This default implementation for <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension> nodes calls <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個預設實作<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension>節點呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to call into a more specific method on a derived visitor class of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor> class.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法來呼叫更特定類別上的方法在衍生的訪客的<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, it should still support unknown visitors by calling <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它應該仍然支援未知的訪客藉由呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitor.VisitExtension%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the array if the value of the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property is <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayBounds" />, or the values to initialize the elements of the new array if the value of the <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> property is <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayInit" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性的值是 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayBounds" />，則取得陣列的界限，如果 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType" /> 屬性的值是 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.NewArrayInit" />，則取得值以初始化新陣列的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects which represent either the bounds of the array or the initialization values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />，表示陣列的界限或初始化值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the static type of the expression that this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得此 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 代表之運算式的靜態類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Type" /> that represents the static type of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 代表運算式靜態類型的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> property of the result.
trans-unit.target: 結果的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.NewArrayExpression.Expressions" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
trans-unit.target: 建立類似這個運算式的新運算式，但使用提供的子系。

trans-unit.source: If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有子系都相同，則會傳回這個運算式。

trans-unit.source: This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
trans-unit.target: 如果未變更任何子系，則為這個運算式；否則為已更新子系的運算式。
